content.raw:
I also try to use this model on gzweb but it turns out that we need to add following changes, is there any limitation that we have to have 3 textures ??? I'm using gzweb 1.1.0 and gazebo 2.2.3 on indigo/trusty

```
#!c++

k-okada@kokada-t440s:~/catkin_ws/ws_tork/src/gazebo_models$ hg diff
diff -r 3c81a9c40e79 apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/model-1_4.sdf
--- a/apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/model-1_4.sdf	Sat Jan 03 23:40:08 2015 +0900
+++ b/apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/model-1_4.sdf	Sun Jan 04 03:53:40 2015 +0900
@@ -17,10 +17,28 @@
         <geometry>
           <heightmap>
             <texture>
+              <diffuse>file://media/materials/textures/dirt_diffusespecular.png</diffuse>
+              <normal>file://media/materials/textures/flat_normal.png</normal>
+              <size>5</size>
+            </texture>
+            <texture>
+              <diffuse>file://media/materials/textures/grass_diffusespecular.png</diffuse>
+              <normal>file://media/materials/textures/flat_normal.png</normal>
+              <size>5</size>
+            </texture>
+            <texture>
               <diffuse>file://apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/materials/textures/AS17-134-20508HR_1024x1024_1.jpg</diffuse>
               <normal>file://media/materials/textures/flat_normal.png</normal>
-              <size>3</size>
+              <size>20</size>
             </texture>
+            <blend>
+              <min_height>-150</min_height>
+              <fade_dist>5</fade_dist>
+            </blend>
+            <blend>
+              <min_height>-100</min_height>
+              <fade_dist>10</fade_dist>
+            </blend>
             <uri>model://apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/materials/textures/NAC_DTM_APOLLO15_E261N0036_2000x2000+611+5682.png</uri>
             <size>1000 1000 80</size>
             <pos>0 0 -77</pos>

```
content.html:
I also try to use this model on gzweb but it turns out that we need to add following changes, is there any limitation that we have to have 3 textures ??? I'm using gzweb 1.1.0 and gazebo 2.2.3 on indigo/trusty

k-okada@kokada-t440s:~/catkin_ws/ws_tork/src/gazebo_models$ hg diff
diff -r 3c81a9c40e79 apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/model-1_4.sdf
--- a/apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/model-1_4.sdf Sat Jan 03 23:40:08 2015 +0900
+++ b/apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/model-1_4.sdf Sun Jan 04 03:53:40 2015 +0900
@@ -17,10 +17,28 @@
         <geometry>
           <heightmap>
             <texture>
+              <diffuse>file://media/materials/textures/dirt_diffusespecular.png</diffuse>
+              <normal>file://media/materials/textures/flat_normal.png</normal>
+              <size>5</size>
+            </texture>
+            <texture>
+              <diffuse>file://media/materials/textures/grass_diffusespecular.png</diffuse>
+              <normal>file://media/materials/textures/flat_normal.png</normal>
+              <size>5</size>
+            </texture>
+            <texture>
               <diffuse>file://apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/materials/textures/AS17-134-20508HR_1024x1024_1.jpg</diffuse>
               <normal>file://media/materials/textures/flat_normal.png</normal>
-              <size>3</size>
+              <size>20</size>
             </texture>
+            <blend>
+              <min_height>-150</min_height>
+              <fade_dist>5</fade_dist>
+            </blend>
+            <blend>
+              <min_height>-100</min_height>
+              <fade_dist>10</fade_dist>
+            </blend>
             <uri>model://apollo15_landing_site_1000x1000/materials/textures/NAC_DTM_APOLLO15_E261N0036_2000x2000+611+5682.png</uri>
             <size>1000 1000 80</size>
             <pos>0 0 -77</pos>
